neurotools.jobs.decorator module¶

neurotools.jobs.decorator.argument_signature(function, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Convert the function arguments and values to a unique set. Throws ValueError if the provided arguments cannot match argspec.

neurotools.jobs.decorator.listit(t)[source]¶
neurotools.jobs.decorator.memoize(f)[source]¶

Memoization decorator

neurotools.jobs.decorator.print_signature(sig)[source]¶

Formats the argument signature for printing.

neurotools.jobs.decorator.sanitize(sig, mode=u'liberal')[source]¶

Converts an argument signature into a standard format. Lists will be converted to tuples. Non-hashable types will cause an error.

“strict” mode requires that all data be numeric primitives or strings containing “very safe” chracters a-zA-Z0-9 and space

neurotools.jobs.decorator.summarize_function(f)[source]¶

Prints function information, Used for debugging decorators.

neurotools.jobs.decorator.timed(f)[source]¶

Timer decorator, modifies return type to include runtime

neurotools.jobs.decorator.tupleit(t)[source]¶
neurotools.jobs.decorator.unwrap(f)[source]¶

Strips decorators from a decorated function, provided that the decorators were so kind as to set the .__wrapped__ attribute
